titles.title: TANF and Related Programs Extension Act of 2005
A bill to reauthorize the Temporary Assistance for Needy Families block grant program through June 30, 2006, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services

bill.summary: 12/16/2005--Introduced. TANF and Related Programs Extension Act of 2005 - Reauthorizes and extends through June 30, 2006, in the manner authorized for FY2005, the Temporary Assistance for Needy Families (TANF) Block Grant Program under part A of title IV of the Social Security Act (SSA), additional grants to Puerto Rico, the Virgin Islands, Guam, and American Samoa, funding for state abstinence education programs under SSA title V (Maternal and Child Health Services Block Grant), and eligibility for Transitional Medical Assistance (TMA) under SSA title XIX (Medicaid). Reauthorizes and extends the national random sample study of child welfare and child welfare waiver authority through June 30, 2006, in the manner authorized for FY2005.
